attributes.additional_details: In current climate health and well being of people is essential.  Golf is a sport played by millions and that falls within the social distancing guidelines. Mental and physical well being of the nation is one of the most important things at this time.
attributes.background:
Open golf courses to encourage exercise whilst observing social distancing rules.
Clubs will be responsible for managing social distancing.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that golf courses in England can re-open. 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
